name: Tofu With Hot Chipotle Barbecue Sauce
description: Instead of throwing out the adobo sauce that canned chipotle peppers are packed in, use it for this sauce. You can marinate the tofu in it for an extra-hot dish, or just brush it on cooked or uncooked tofu. This makes enough for a pound of tofu.
keywords: adobo sauce, ketchup, tofu, appetizer, dairy-free, gluten-free, healthy, low cholesterol, vegan, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon adobo sauce from canned chipotles
2 teaspoons light or dark brown sugar
2 tablespoons unrefined peanut oil or extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together all of the ingredients. Brush on seared or grilled tofu as soon as it comes off the heat, or onto uncooked slices.
